name: Port Morris Home Care Agency, LLC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Port Morris Home Care Agency, LLC is a Home Health provider based in Bronx, NY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $95.9M in Medicaid payments across 675K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $95.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
